title: Who is Oliver Oakes? From karting champion to fleeting F1 team principal
summary: Oliver Oakes briefly led the Alpine F1 team before abruptly resigning after the 2025 Miami Grand Prix. Here's his career story so far

qa_pairs.question: Which F1 team did Oliver Oakes briefly lead as team principal?
In what year did Oliver Oakes resign from his position as team principal?
What type of racing did Oliver Oakes compete in before joining Formula 1?
